long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi, my name is Djigg and I am your new HR assistant.
Install the extension and I will organize all of your meetings with your applicants, including:

- your HR job interviews,
- your operational job interviews,
- your collective recruitment sessions,
- your reminders,
- your job interview reschedulings, etc.
long.fr:
Bonjour, je suis Djigg votre nouvel assistant recrutement.
Installez-moi, et je m'occupe d'organiser toutes vos rencontres avec vos candidats :

- Vos entretiens RH,
- Vos entretiens opérationnels,
- Vos sessions de recrutement,
- Vos relances,
- Vos replanifications...
